name: DocOnline Health India
description: DocOnline is an innovative digital healthcare company that delivers humane and compassionate care by focusing on clinical quality with technology as an enabler. It provides video/phone doctor consultations through over 60 carefully selected in-house doctors trained in telemedicine, equipped with evidence-based clinical tools for appropriate diagnosis and treatment. The model focuses on health outcomes and continuous clinical quality improvements to build patient trust. DocOnline is working with 150+ corporates enabling them to deliver Employee Health and Wellness programs, value-added benefits to their customers, and community CSR initiatives.
features: we believe that trust is the foundation of all relationships. While being at the forefront of the digital healthcare revolution
we strive to deliver high-quality, affordable, and accessible healthcare
We are always driven by our values of Quality, Compassion and Care.
Headline: Driven by Care. Powered by Technology.
ShortDescription: DocOnline is an innovative digital healthcare company that delivers humane and compassionate care by focusing on clinical quality with technology as an enabler. I
enhanced_description: DocOnline is an innovative digital healthcare company, driven by care and powered by technology, delivering high-quality, affordable, and accessible video/phone doctor consultations. With over 60 carefully selected in-house doctors trained in telemedicine and equipped with evidence-based clinical tools, DocOnline focuses on clinical quality, health outcomes, and continuous improvement to build patient trust. The platform is specifically designed to support corporate Employee Health and Wellness programs, value-added employee benefits, and community CSR initiatives for over 150 corporate clients, aiming to improve employee happiness and engagement.
competitive_advantages: Access to over 60 carefully selected in-house doctors trained in telemedicine
Doctors equipped with evidence-based clinical tools for diagnosis and treatment
Focus on health outcomes and continuous clinical quality improvements
Aims to provide affordable and accessible healthcare
roi_benefits: Delivery of high-quality, affordable, and accessible healthcare for employees
primary_users: Employees (as beneficiaries of consultations and wellness programs)
HR Professionals (managing employee health and wellness programs)
